symptoms: High latency on checkout service, CPU usage > 90%
root_cause: Memory leak in payment gateway connector v2.1
resolution: Rolled back payment connector to v2.0 and restarted service.

symptoms: Database connection timeout, 500 errors on login
root_cause: Max connection pool limit reached due to stuck threads
resolution: Increased connection pool size to 200 and killed stuck threads.

symptoms: Disk space warning on log server, 95% full
resolution: Manually compressed old logs and fixed logrotate.conf permissions.
